page.title: 17TRADE
page.content: The majority of people in the area treat Penrith as their normal shopping centre with Carlisle as a major centre.Penrith is a natural country market town with it's auction mart,banks,business offices,estate agencies,major post office,bus and rail stations,many inns and eating places and a wide range of shops including leading chain stores. It is a very busy and active town catering not only for the local population but also an increasing number of tourists. Morland has a shop but it caters for only a small number of residents as the rest shop in Penrith or use the mobile shops that regularly visit the villages.These include two butchers,bakers,general stores and greengrocers.Cliburn has a post office as has Gt.Strickland.
